# players

**Instance Property**

The players that join the match.

## Declaration

```swift
var players: [GKPlayer] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property includes all players except the local player.

## Working with other players

- **expectedPlayerCount**: The remaining number of players invited but not yet connected to the match.
